rules.rationale: MESA Lung ancillary CT imaging datasets. Table names contain 'LungCT' or 'LungExam'. ~1900 vars each, covering quantitative CT measures of lung structure.
rules.description: e.g. 'MESA Lung Ancillary Study Exam 1 Dataset: This dataset provides Exam 1 quantitative lung CT imaging data'

rules.rationale: Lung airway measurements from CT scans. Separate from main LungCT tables, these focus on airway dimensions.
rules.description: e.g. 'MESA Lung Airway Ancillary Study Exam 1 Dataset: This dataset provides airway data'

rules.rationale: MESA Exam 1 continuous waveform ECG dataset, 574 vars.
rules.description: 'MESA Continuous wave ECG Dataset: This dataset provides ECG measurements'

rules.rationale: Lung function spirometry datasets from MESA Lung, Air NR, and Family ancillary studies. ~177-182 vars each.
rules.description: e.g. 'MESA Lung Spirometry Dataset: The MESA Lung Spirometry Exam provides pulmonary function measures'

rules.rationale: IMT = Intima-Media Thickness. Carotid ultrasound measurement of arterial wall thickness, a subclinical atherosclerosis marker. 173 vars.
rules.description: 'MESA Air New Recruit Intima-Media Thickness (IMT) Dataset: This dataset provides carotid IMT measures'

rules.rationale: Retinal photography from the MESA Eye ancillary study. Exam 2 and Exam 5 datasets, ~198 vars each.
rules.description: 'MESA Eye Ancillary Study Dataset: This dataset provides Exam 2/5 retinal photography data'

rules.rationale: Abdominal body composition measured from CT scans — visceral and subcutaneous adipose tissue areas. Note: the sibling table 'AbdBodyComposition' (without 'CT') contains serum biomarkers, not CT data.
rules.description: 'MESA Ancillary Study Dataset: MESA Classic CT measures of Abdominal Body Composition'

rules.rationale: CT-based vascular calcification measurements: aortic calcification, aortic valve calcification, and coronary artery calcium scores.
rules.description: e.g. 'MESA Exam 4 Abdominal Aortic CT Ancillary Dataset: The MESA Exam 4 dataset provides aortic calcification CT measures'

rules.rationale: Aortic valvular calcium score datasets without the 'CT' suffix in the name.
rules.description: 'MESA Classic Aortic Valvular Calcium Dataset: This dataset contains aortic valve calcium measures'

rules.rationale: Pericardial fat volume measured from cardiac CT scans, a marker of cardiovascular risk.
rules.description: 'MESA Pericardial Fat Dataset: This is an ancillary study dataset with pericardial fat measures'

rules.rationale: Air pollution exposure estimates from the MESA Air ancillary study, for MESA classic, Air NR, and Family cohorts.
rules.description: 'MESA Air Ancillary Study MESA Exposure Dataset: This dataset provides estimates of individual-level air pollution exposure'

rules.rationale: MESA Sleep ancillary study — overnight polysomnography recordings from Exam 5.
rules.description: 'MESA Sleep Ancillary Study Dataset from Exam 5'

rules.rationale: NAFLD = Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease. Liver CT measurements for hepatic steatosis quantification.
rules.description: 'MESA Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease (NAFLD) Liver CT Dataset'

rules.rationale: BMD = Bone Mineral Density. MESA ancillary study measuring DXA-derived bone density.
rules.description: 'MESA Ancillary Study Dataset: MESA Classic measures of bone mineral density'

rules.rationale: FMD = Flow-Mediated Dilation. Brachial artery ultrasound measure of endothelial function.
rules.description: 'MESA Flow Mediated Dilation (FMD) Dataset: This is an ancillary study dataset with FMD measures'

rules.rationale: Right ventricular function measured from cardiac MRI.
rules.description: 'MESA RV Function Ancillary Study Dataset. This dataset provides right ventricular function measures from cardiac MRI'

rules.rationale: CT scan reads for 185 lung case-control subjects — visual scoring of CT images.
rules.description: 'MESA Lung CT Read 185: Lung CT reads for 185 case-control subjects'
